body:
@sameershende @eugeneswalker 
This PR will add the e4s tags, the `ecp` tag is already registered with some packages so we just adding it assuming these packages are part of E4S and ECP. I used this [spack.yaml](https://github.com/E4S-Project/e4s/blob/master/spack.yaml) as a reference for identifying packages that are part of E4S. If this makes sense by all means we can start tagging the packages with `e4s`. This can be useful with `spack find -t e4s` to filter packages from non-e4s.

```
bash-3.2$ spack list -t e4s
==> 8 packages.
adios  adios2  aml  amrex  arborx  argobots  ascent  axom
```

```
bash-3.2$ spack list -t ecp
==> 29 packages.
adios   aml       amrex   argobots  axl   chombo            er    kvtree  latte      nek5000  nektools  parsplice  rankstr  shuffile  veloc
adios2  amr-wind  arborx  ascent    axom  ecp-data-vis-sdk  filo  lammps  nalu-wind  nekrs    nwchem    qmcpack    redset   spath

```
title: Add e4s tags
